GSD.description:
net_sched: cls_route: remove from list when handle is 0

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.211 by commit 1fcd691cc2e7f808eca2e644adee1f1c6c1527fd. For more details please see the references link.
